parameter.name: logon_token_app_id
parameter.description:
Specifies an alternate Azure Entra ID application (client) ID to be used exclusively for acquiring .B ACCESS_TOKEN values on behalf of the user during logon script execution. If not set, the value of .B app_id will be used instead.
This option allows using a separate application registration that carries the specific API permissions required by logon scripts.
.PP \fBNote:\fR In the Azure Portal for the application corresponding to \fBlogon_token_app_id\fR, ensure that the redirect URI \fIhttps://login.microsoftonline.com/common/oauth2/nativeclient\fR is enabled under "Mobile and desktop applications" in the Authentication section. This is required for Himmelblau to obtain tokens via the public client flow.
